World information: A
shirt only takes a few minutes  to wear on
the body and provide a detailed diagnosis of the
heart's electrical activity. This invention by a
research team at
Univ College London in the UK can be used
to predict the risk of sudden
cardiac death. The ecgi electrocardiogram vest
Equipped with 256 sensors,
worn by the patient while at rest or
gradually, the device can provide a three-
dimensional map of the heart that includes electrical currents traveling throughout the
heart's chambers. Doctors combine
this data with imaging images.  Cong Hung from emr
to make a
diagnosis this technology can be rolled out
to thousands of people at a
relatively low cost compared to other technologies
other than 12-lead electrocardiogram
ecgi vest that does not use gel and can  When
used again, I don't feel anything, just
a little pressure when the shirt bulges
like wearing a large shirt. There is
nothing uncomfortable at all. The ecgi shirt has been
successfully tested on about 800 people. The
device is being used.  used to
map the hearts of people with diseases such as
hypertrophic cardiomyopathy and dilated cardiomyopathy, the cgi shirt
has been patented in the US and the
research team is looking for ways to make
this invention widely available.
